article_title: Can Skipping the Runway Pay Off?
article_text:
Can a fashion designer skip the runways and get away with it?

After 15 years of runway shows at New York fashion week, Rebecca Taylor canceled her fall 2015 show. She used her roughly $500,000 annual show budget to deploy a marketing strategy she believes is more in tune with the way consumers connect to fashion today. She engaged a digital marketing consultant to work on strategies such as search engine optimization and social...
